content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. My name is Ava, your virtual assistant. Could I please get your name to get started with booking your appointment?
Yeah, it’s Steve Johnson. Can we just get this set up quickly? Had a leak all weekend.
Thank you, Steve. I'm sorry to hear about the leak. Could you provide your address so I can confirm we cover your area and get the right team ready?
Thanks, Steve. Can you briefly describe the plumbing issue and let me know your ideal date and time for a visit?
Pipe under kitchen sink is dripping pretty bad. If you’ve got anything today after 3pm that’d be good.
Thank you for the details, Steve. Let me check our availability for today after 3pm for a plumber to come out.
We have an opening at 3:30pm today. Would you like to confirm this appointment?
Yes, 3:30 is fine. Please send someone.
Your plumbing appointment is confirmed for today at 3:30pm at 1223 Maple Drive, Glenwood. We’ll send you a reminder before your plumber arrives. Please let me know if you have any questions!
